lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: After travelling through East Africa in 2007, I wanted to do something to help the many wonderful people I met. I feel that by loaning through Kiva I can make a real positive impact on people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I develop blood tests that are then used to help diagnose diseases such as dengue, malaria and Japanese encephalitis.

lender.name: GODWIN
lender.loan_because: I NEED THE LOAN OF 8000 DOLLARS TO DEVELOPE MY FARM LAND
lender.occupational_info: I AM AN AFRICAN FARMER WHO IS TRY TO GET OUT OF HARD SHIP

lender.name: FAHS Seniors
lender.loan_because: we are interested in helping others around the world, and learning about how businesses worldwide are developed.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of high school seniors taking economics. We combine service learning with learning about entrepreneurship, businesses and markets, trade, and globalization.

lender.name: MMK
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who help themselves.

lender.name: Justin
lender.occupational_info: I work for a firm that advises unstable companies on future operational and financial decisions.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help brothers and sisters in Africa....
lender.occupational_info: Boring banker in a big tower..

lender.name: Bre and Nicholas
lender.loan_because: giving is the best feeling in the world. I have been fortunate to have a strong educational background that keeps me in a satisfying and rewarding job. I want to give to others so that they may fulfill their dreams and pass on the act of giving to others.
lender.occupational_info: Bre is a teacher in a low income, highly diverse area. Nicholas owns a martial arts school and works with over 200 students to better their training and character skills.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: inequalities suck.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct community assessment, program evaluation, and survey research.

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: I received this gift certificate from my daughter for Christmas - what a wonderful idea. I plan to continue to lend through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired School Secretary.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: The need is great.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe that something more than simple charity is needed to give someone a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired now but continue to travel to out-of-the-way places.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: I can afford to do it and I love the idea that people can help themselves; with a little help from others.
lender.occupational_info: Director of Quality Assurance for a company that makes computer-based training. We take care of the editing and the company's quality management system.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: All we have in this world is each other.
lender.occupational_info: I represent disabled people in court

lender.name: Meftihe Achamyeleh
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do.

lender.name: Sherif
lender.loan_because: of Jesus Christ

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: as long as I am financially able to, I will
lender.occupational_info: I work part time as an office manager at a housing company and I attend Architecture school full time.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is an important way to help people help themselves through creating a means of economic livelihood that is a source of strength and growth for the individual, the family, and the community in general.

lender.name: Homayoun
lender.loan_because: I decide to give my self best birthday gift, which was help the others, it is much easier to be giver then taker!

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want someone on the other side of the world to know that someone on this side of the world cares.

lender.name: Christof
lender.loan_because: There is no greater reward than to help someone need,
lender.occupational_info: I write stories about mysterious people and fantastical places. I add music, some special effects, and have actors read the stories aloud. Then I put them on a website to share with people.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Supporting development projects for USAID.

lender.name: Joey N.
lender.loan_because: hard working people deserve access to capital in order to invest in their livelihoods and build a better life for themselves and their family
lender.occupational_info: I help foundations, charities, and social enterprises, and the people who fund them and run them make sure they follow the law

lender.name: Kit
lender.loan_because: I want to help the less fortunate and keep the poverty level down. It also feels good to give someone else an opportunity to progress to help themselves and their family.

lender.name: Karen and Ron
lender.loan_because: We are thankful to have been given the support that we needed to obtain an education, to work in professions that we love, and to make a difference. Everyone deserves an opportunity to reach for their dreams and to succeed. Through Kiva, we have a chance to give support to those who want to better themselves.

lender.name: Josiah
lender.loan_because: I have seen with my own eyes what a war-ravaged country looks like.
lender.occupational_info: I was in the military and am now going to school. Some day I'd like to do more than just donate money.

lender.name: Katie
lender.whereabouts: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam and Tucson, AZ
lender.loan_because: I can. I have lived overseas since 1992 and feel the need to help others in many different ways. Kiva is one small way that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a volunteer and I teach adults how to work with girls for the Girl Scouting/Girl Guiding program. I am an international trainer and travel worldwide for this work. I currently live in Vietnam and train mostly in East Asia. I also work with girls in Vietnam, teaching them life skills and how to plan things for themselves.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I loan because I know what it is like to have a dream and want a better life for myself, my family, and my friends. I loan because I can help to enable others dreams.

lender.name: MessageMedia
lender.occupation: SMS service provider for business and government
lender.loan_because: MessageMedia aims to be more than just a business that provides a service. Our team feels strongly about lending a hand, and as a company weâve embraced a range of initiatives that give something back to the community. We believe micro-finance organisations like Kiva provide solutions for lifting people out of poverty for the long term.
lender.occupational_info:
MessageMedia is Australiaâs largest provider of SMS solutions for business and government. We have offices in the US and UK, and over 9000 clients around the world.
www.messagemedia.com.au
www.message-media.com
www.messagemedia.co.uk

lender.name: Susie & John
lender.loan_because: It feels great to join in and be part of someone else's success and growth.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to see good progress in the world and motivate myself to create more of it. A little in the USA is a lot in the rest of the world. How can I not?
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small workshop that makes shelves and decorations and displays for retail stores that promote products.

lender.name: Serdar
lender.loan_because: We should care the people who needs support around the world, to make it a better place to live for all the of us. I believe, even small amounts will make huge difference for them, let us hepl each other!

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of entrepreneurship and the hidden power ingrained in the poor...all they need is a little encouragement.

lender.name: Bou Lucia
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves to be productive

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I have a disposable income and I want to help. I go to school, and work on the weekend. Here's hoping I'll be able to give others those opportunities. "I shall not live in vain."
lender.occupational_info: I am an high school student at a good private school in Australia. I also work on my weekends at a local pharmacy. I'm lucky like that.

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: I love helping Entrepreneurs make their dreams happen.
lender.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs make their dreams happen.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Giving is right. Capitalism is good. Freedom comes from both.
lender.occupational_info: I search for people who commit fraud or cheat others and do my best to have them punished.

lender.name: JRS
lender.loan_because: God wants each of us to be a blessing to others... "For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also." ~ Matthew 6:21

lender.name: steve laszczak
lender.loan_because: I am able in a small way to help people better themselves.

lender.name: Kelly at Paper Stories
lender.loan_because: as a small business owner in the arts, I understand the importance of funding to succeed. I want to provide assistance to other small business owners so that they can have the same opportunities I have had.
lender.occupational_info: Using an antique printing press, I create greeting cards and other forms of artwork on paper. The printing press is a large machine that applies colored ink onto a raised surface that I have designed, and presses it into the surface of the paper.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is the most direct and easiest way to reach across any distance to help our global brothers and sisters help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am graduate school at Forhdam University.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with providing for all of my needs, and I would like to participate in His doing the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: I assist workers with any concerns they have about their work, including pay, benefits, relationships with co-workers or supervisors, or even personal concerns that affect their ability to work.

lender.name: Larry & Leslie
lender.loan_because: because I have been a business man for 15 years and have always struggled to get loans. I have been blessed with success and would like to see other endeavors succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a commericial fisherman, I also charter fish and I own a small wood products manufacturing business. I also teach wood shop at the local high school in the mornings.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: My godmother introduced me to it by a gift certificate for my birthday. Thought it sounded like a really smart idea for helping others, and easy too!

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: It's one small way to make a difference in this big world.

lender.name: Tori
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make better lives for themselves by being self-sufficient and productive.
lender.occupational_info: I furnish and decorate homes for re-sale.

lender.name: Jai
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is possible to create change without being wealthy.
lender.occupational_info: I cook for people and write about cooking.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: We all have the means to help

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: Kiva empowers people who want to do good for themselves and their family.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: There is nothing better than individuals attempting to better their circumstances. Joining with others to help these individuals makes a beautiful, global community.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently studying History, Geography, and Economics in the university.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: it feels good

lender.name: Sandi
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work with disadvantaged children in Sihanoukville, Cambodia, b enriching their lives through artistic expression through my work with the NGO, CCPP

lender.name: Pontus & Nilla
lender.loan_because: We would like to help other people, especially women, to achieve their goals. We believe that a loan makes you feel more independent than charity.

lender.name: Stu & Jill
lender.loan_because: We belive, that given the chance, people can improve their lives.

lender.name: Daphne
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: John and Nancy
lender.loan_because:
A small amount can make a difference. We also believe that prosperity leads to peace.
Nancy adds: When I was in college and needed money, my adviser lent me $20 with one stipulation: That in the future I would lend it to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: We're both educators (John -- Career Development, Nancy -- Dance). We are very involved in the arts and progressive political causes. We have 6 cats who realize that our loans also help kitties in other countries. They're on board.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need. I want to share.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an account manager for a tech firm.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I want to do more good in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I provide reliable technology solutions that help small businesses perform.

lender.name: The Hannah Montanas
lender.loan_because: We have been studying economics, and learned about Kiva in a presentation from founder Jessica Flannery in a series on "Hope and Action." To end the year, we felt it was a good use of our money.

lender.name: Tanita
lender.loan_because: I believe children suffer the most as a result of poverty. If we can empower thier parents to make a change for the better, children around the world in turn get a chance - it's all about empowerment.
lender.occupational_info: I help people/companies communicate about who they are and what they offer to a community and why they are different or better.

lender.name: Torres Family
lender.loan_because: People have helped me when I was in trouble. We are all human beings and we need each other.
lender.occupational_info: I draw construction plans for Hospitals

lender.name: Dave and JoeAnn
lender.loan_because: We own a custom cabinet business and know what its like to get a small business going.
lender.occupational_info: A cabinet builder for 40 years recently started our own business.

lender.name: Harvey
lender.loan_because: I have traveled over 9 years in the developing world. Instead of feeling horror at what my government is doing, I prefer to do something positive
lender.occupational_info: I help care for animals that have been abandonded and abused, eventually finding loving homes for them.

lender.name: ACN - PPA Team
lender.loan_because: We will provide the resources to equip entrepreneurs in developing nations with solutions that will enable them to realize the full potential of their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: We provide innovative, high-performing solutions driven by the needs of our client.

lender.name: Bob
lender.occupation: Health Consultant, Instructor of Political Science
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of thinking about the world in terms of "we" instead of "I."
lender.occupational_info: Instructor of political science at Everett Community College. I regularly show a video about KIVA when I discuss the "democratic ideal." I am also a health consultant for the State of WA Dept of Health.

lender.name: CapWest
lender.loan_because: CapWest believes anyone who has the dream and determination to better the lives of themselves, their family, and their community deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info:
CapWest Mortgage is a diversified bank dedicated to providing high quality loan products and services to its customers.
CapWest philosophies are paralleled with that of its parent, Farmers Bank & Trust, N.A., of Great Bend, Kansas; quality, honesty, integrity and ethics. A progressive national banking organization, Farmers Bank & Trust has strengthened customer confidence for over 100 years.

lender.name: Moldovanu
lender.loan_because: I required money, and have received them from the stranger
lender.occupational_info: It is pleasant to Me to do interesting business, especially if for it pay money

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: a little assistance can enable people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Tax adviser to UK and International business

lender.name: Caleb
lender.loan_because: Helping someone getting a better life is a legitimate cause.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Technology cordinator for an elementary school in Orlando Florida, US. I am now working on a project called " High Speed Internet For Everyone". The project is conceived to make broadband internet available to developping countries and have it at a very low cost.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.occupation: child caregiver and aspiring children's author
lender.loan_because: no matter how much or how little we have, there is always enough to share.

lender.name: Stan
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and should share my good fortune.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it is nice to see even a tiny amount or effort impacts the world and grows.

lender.name: Karen-Marie
lender.loan_because: I have the possibility to give!
lender.occupational_info: When you are privileged enough to be able to do just about anything you want, I feel obligated to lend a helping hand to those who just need that little bit extra ...

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lender.name: jojo
lender.loan_because: i think i can be an instrument in making a positive change to someone

lender.name: Sean and Barbara
lender.loan_because: We're blessed so that we may bless others. We're just a pipeline for God's love in a tangible form.

lender.name: Liliana
lender.loan_because: I want to give back! and help people
lender.occupational_info:
Im an international student from Peru. Im currently studying business at University of West Florida in Pensacola, Florida. I know how people in my country struggle to get financing to run a business. That is the reason i want to help my people and people around the world. I just want to share 2 bible verses that teach me that we need to be generous givers Luke 3:8a, 10-11 â â âProduce fruit in keeping with repentance ...â ... âWhat should we do then?â the crowd asked. John answered, âThe man with two tunics should share with him who has none, and the one who has food should do the same.â â
Acts 20:35b â â[T]he Lord Jesus himself said: âIt is more blessed to give than to receive.â â

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: With a small amount of money you can make a big difference
lender.occupational_info: Our organization promotes collaboration and de-duplication of efforts to help serve homeless populations

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: it is my honor to help someone in need because i have been fortunate to have strong family ties and friends that are there for me when i am in need. I like to offer the same when I can.
lender.occupational_info: i work for a well known cancer hospital - my job is helping the patients from a financial level and it is very rewarding.

lender.name: Trudie
lender.loan_because:
As you set out for Ithaka hope your road is a long one, full of adventure, full of discovery. Laistrygonians, Cyclops, angry Poseidon-don't be afraid of them: you'll never find things like that on your way as long as you keep your thoughts raised high, as long as a rare excitement stirs your spirit and your body. Laistrygonians, Cyclops, wild Poseidon-you won't encounter them unless you bring them along inside your soul, unless your soul sets them up in front of you.
Hope your road is a long one. May there be many summer mornings when, with what pleasure, what joy, you enter harbors you're seeing for the first time; may you stop at Phoenician trading stations to buy fine things, mother of pearl and coral, amber and ebony, sensual perfume of every kind- as many sensual perfumes as you can; and may you visit many Egyptian cities to learn and go on learning from their scholars.
Keep Ithaka always in your mind. Arriving there is what you're destined for. But don't hurry the journey at all. Better if it lasts for years, so you're old by the time you reach the island, wealthy with all you've gained on the way, not expecting Ithaka to make you rich. Ithaka gave you the marvelous journey. Without her you wouldn't have set out. She has nothing left to give you now.
And if you find her poor, Ithaka won't have fooled you. Wise as you will have become, so full of experience, you'll have understood by then what these Ithakas mean.
CP Cavafy

lender.name: Jeff
lender.occupational_info: I help a team of people stay organized to solve technical problems and repair computers.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky in this life.I want to share with people who are trying hard to improve their lives. I have a special affinity for women because they are disadvantaged in many parts of the world based purely on their gender.
lender.occupational_info: I am a health care provider for children. I evaluate ,diagnose and treat illnesses or maintain health by administering preventive health care.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I want to be an example for my daughter. I have more than I need and want to share it with others.

lender.name: Jamie VanBuskirk
lender.loan_because: I survived childhood without being struck down by malaria, diareha, AIDS or sporadic gun play so I'd say my life sucks a whole lot less that a lot of people's lives. Plus it's great filler in boring conversations. "Gee that's swell... Did I tell you I recently financed a Ugandan micro brewery and indirectly improved the lives of five extended families? No? Well listen up..."
lender.occupational_info: I'm a faceless middle manager whose day to day toilings are of no global consequence what so ever.

lender.name: Shermin
lender.loan_because: I love the fact that a little goes a long way, and I can use the same money to do it again, and again, and again to help different people...
lender.occupational_info: I follow Asian elephants as they go about their daily lives in Sri Lanka. Right now I'm also trying to crowd-fund my research (see link).

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: To make a difference

lender.name: Uma
lender.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help someone help themselves to accomplish their goals.

lender.name: Svala
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a law office.

lender.name: David
lender.occupation: Retired Research Programmer and Antique Restorer
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have been born in the United States where I have had many opportunities to grow and prosper. I want to share this prosperity with others who were not so fortunate as I, but who just need a little help to find new opportunities for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: For over 25 years I designed, installed, and maintained computer and network systems and programs at the University of Illinois. Now I find vintage and antique clocks, radios, and phonographs which are broken, damaged, or abused, and restore them to the way they were when they were new.

lender.name: Tabrel
lender.loan_because: There have been times in my life I needed a loan and could not get one.

lender.name: Barbara DiBiase
lender.loan_because: It is imperative that those who can, do something to help create an equitable balance in the distribution of resources worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: To asssit my town and those around us in discovering and implementing ways to use our resources in more sustainable and efficient ways, so that the earth's limited capabilities are extended equitably for future generations.

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: Having been raised in a third world country, I'd like to leave a tiny footprint in this world by helping the less fortunate try to break out of their poverty cycle.
lender.occupational_info: hard, ethical, honest and trustworthy worker

lender.name: Le Newsletter
lender.loan_because: We have lots of opportunity where I live, so when I can, I like to help people to succeed in places where there isn't as much opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I write about other people's businesses in a way that helps them get new customers and make more money.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I really want to see women in developing countries own and operate thriving small businesses in order for them to create happier, healthier lives for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I run my own business helping individuals and businesses create cool, community-oriented websites.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I have been really lucky and would like to spread that luck.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of contributing to something that so many say is not possible. I see defaults every day from people with 1000 x the means of the average Kiva borrower and am inspired by people lifting them selves and their families up through focused self determination.
lender.occupational_info: I do analysis and implement policy to help profitably grow the company I work for.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance and I am fortunate enough to be able to help.

lender.name: LolaG
lender.loan_because: What a cool way to give!

lender.name: GS5
lender.loan_because: We teach the kids of what we have and what we can do, of where others live and what they endeavor to do.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupation: Sustainability Communications for Green start up

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I'm able to. If I were ever unable or in need, I would hope that someone, somewhere would do the same for me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a part-time student slowly working my way through school one latte at a time....

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: I believe that sharing is the only way forward.
lender.occupational_info: I design global computer networks

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: Someone helped me when I needed it and I am paying that forward.

lender.name: Andres & Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help those who need help to move toward a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Investment Professional with a wonderful wife and four beautiful children. Veronica is my wife. Ariana, Isabela, Natalia and Matias are my children.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed
lender.occupational_info: Right now, I've re-entered school life to upgrade my job skills.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: We are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I write fiction about real injustices in the world to bring them to light in a way that everyone can relate to.

lender.name: Kalle & Tove
lender.loan_because:
We saw Nobel Peace price winner Prof. Muhammad Yunus on TV talking about micro-lending and how we all can contribute to help and support entrepreneurs to improve their life for themselves and reach their goals and dreams with loans from other people.
We decided to join Kiva and be a part of that group of people around the world who are willing to support entrepreneurs with a Small Loan that will enable that persons or that group to reach their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Kalle works with Computers and IT and Tove works as a children's pre school teatcher.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: it's good to help other people.

lender.name: audrey
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in women's lives in a volatile part of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I buy houses, fix them up, and rent them.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I believe that all people deserve to live a happy productive life and be given the opportunity to provide a good standard of living for their families.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from the Thames Valley District School Board

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: A wonderful way to help people help themselves and bring access to capital to people who might otherwise never have this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I'm involved with managing money for sophisticated investors and those for whom capitalism has already worked very well.

lender.name: Pat & Ana
lender.loan_because: It feels good doing something for somebody else.

lender.name: South County Girl
lender.loan_because: We all need more humanity, grace, and love, --- not abundance, greed, arrogance, and pride
lender.occupational_info: On a day to day basis I help run a gym and fitness center with tennis courts, a pool, and work out machines for my local city. I also lifeguard at the same place.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a school, with children between the ages of 11 and 14.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Traveling the world I see poverty first hand and know my Kiva contribution can make a difference in thier lives.
lender.occupational_info: Marine Officer (Ship's Captain)

lender.name: Lilika
lender.loan_because: I looked at my life and realized how completely great it was. We can complain about the small things and these people don't get that luxury. Imagine that complaining can be a luxury! Sure, I don't live in a mansion with butlers and maids and have a lot of money; but why would you even spend money on something as useless as that when you can spend it to help someone else? We don't need all the things that we can have; definitely not. So whenever I look at something and say "hey, that's cool. I want it" I just think about all those people out there who need that money much more than me, and it cures my craving pretty quickly.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I admire the entrepreneurial spirit and hard work of the recipients.
lender.occupational_info: I work to reduce the impact of climate change.

lender.name: Nikita
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship - not charity - is the answer to world poverty. With good ideas, motivation, hard work and possibility of financing with favourable terms anything is possible.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I have been very lucky in life and I want to help others
lender.occupational_info: Risk management - helping solve problems

lender.name: Micah
lender.loan_because: I work for a network of Christian MFI's, so I LOVE loaning to those clients that I have the privilege of serving on a daily basis.
lender.occupational_info: I crunch numbers to help our MFI's run more effectively and efficiently.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I like to think of making a difference -- and sharing the connection, however transitory, with another person seeking to improve themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work to achieve a sustainable healthy future for the human being and our relationship to our planet.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to fulfill there life potential!

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.occupation: Reiki practitioner and champion cookie baker
lender.loan_because: I've been very blessed throughout the years. I want to share hope, encouragement, and cash :-) with others who have dreams and plans for a better life.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected--Luke 12:48
lender.occupational_info: I'm a caregiver, teacher, advocate, and friend of the sick...

lender.name: Jake Martin
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get established in their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I manage between 5 and 65 people depending on the stage of the film. I help with schedules, priorities, and decisions to get the shots done that make up a feature film.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to lift themselves out of poverty

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in helping entrepreneurs in developing countries make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: My company provides loans to other companies to buy or build commercial real estate, such as office buildings and warehouses.

lender.name: Aidan
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do

lender.name: Gayle
lender.loan_because: It's such an easy way to help people!
lender.occupational_info: I analyze the way business processes work and identify any problems or inefficiencies.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I want to give back some of the help I received in hard times. My children are no longer dependent and this is an opportunity to assist another family.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: Making just a small difference in someone's life is a good feeling
lender.occupational_info: I work as a senior consultant in the computer field

lender.name: Laurin
lender.loan_because: I wish good luck to all you entrepreneurs. Laurin

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Greg Savoy
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I work hard to keep our employees safe and injury free.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I'm so happy to be a part of this. =)
lender.occupational_info: I am a student now, so most of my work is fairly easy. Lots of reading and writing.

lender.name: Sabina
lender.loan_because: I like to see others succeed in what they love to do. And I know my loans will also make a big difference in improving the lifestyle of others who just need a little helping hand.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: . . . to know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived, this is to have succeeded.

lender.name: mokum
lender.loan_because: I know the power of money.
lender.occupational_info: Making money work.

lender.name: Better Me, Inc
lender.loan_because: We want to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info:
We improve communities, businesses and lifestyles one solution at a time.
For more details visit www.thenetworklive.com a place for socially responsible entrepreneurs.

lender.name: David and Kim
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone willing to work should have the chance to borrow money to improve their living conditions.

lender.name: Dirk, Jorji & Jarrah
lender.loan_because: Who says that one can't change the world? Hey, here we are, doing it! Definitely beats spending money on haircuts :)
lender.occupational_info:
People send me texts in English and I write them in German.
I raise the money I am lending by making music in the street.

lender.name: Kellaux
lender.loan_because: Because we are fortunate enough to be able to... and we believe the old saying âGive a man a fish and feed him for a day... Teach a man to fish and feed him for a lifetimeâ
lender.occupational_info: Our background is in global management consulting and we are now pursuing our own ventures with focuses on higher education and technology.

lender.name: carolyn
lender.loan_because: I believe i have a responsibilty to help people if I can
lender.occupational_info: I clean peoples houses

lender.name: Kevin
lender.occupational_info: I work at a car dealership in the parts department. When someone asks for a part to fix their car, I look it up and sell it to them.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: the receiver may realize that hope and effort are worthwhile, even as they struggle. Without hope, there is little left. Without effort, hope doesn't really get you anywhere. Maybe my dollars will help them persevere. Persevere.Persevere.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company with the legal aspects of its business, so the business side can focus on helping patients receive their medical imaging results quickly and accurately through the use of technology.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: it is a way to help other people.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: It takes money to make money. I'm hoping to help folks improve their way of life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: The inequality of riches on our planet seems insurmountable to me, but this is one way to make a tiny adjustment in the balance. I was born with so much and I constantly think about how much I have and how could I transfer some of what I have directly to people who need it. Kiva makes this so much more direct than donating to other aid agencies, though they have their place too.
lender.occupational_info: I create training materials for people who are learning computer software to help them design buildings. I also write novels and poetry, but that doesn't make me very much money! I am also training to be a nurse, because that is what I really want to do.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I have a very good life, and I want everyone to realize their life's potential.
lender.occupational_info: I help sports teams create fun and profitable promotions for their fans and to attract new fans.

lender.name: Candice
lender.loan_because: I love reading about people's stories and helping them (a little) achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I interview people and read a lot in order to figure out how to make a website I work on better for our customers.

lender.name: Jay & Paolita
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to give others the same opportunities I have been given.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: It's lovely! I'm honored to have the opportunity to turn a few bits of green paper into something meaningful.

lender.name: LESLIE
lender.loan_because: These folks work so hard just to provide for themselves and there loved ones. As a self-employed person myself, I too work hard to provide. When such a small amount of money to us, can so significantly change the situation for someone else, how can you not give the person a hand up?
lender.occupational_info: I help people secure financing to purchase a home.

lender.name: jwalant
lender.loan_because: Its my principal to donate 5% of my monthly income to the one in real need of money. And KIVA makes the perfect partner to achieve this goal.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a construction company, as a project manager, who is an administrator and manager for construction work in new york.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: Through Kiva, my loan is more 'real' - I / you can see the result of the loan evolving over time, making a difference to the lives it touches.

lender.name: JM Wooster Inc.
lender.loan_because: If we're not on this earth to help one another then what's the point?
lender.occupational_info: Consultant in Human Resources and Organizational Development

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping people directly is the best way to improve the lot of the world.

lender.name: Asha
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping all my relations create food to live in joy.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: We're all neighbors.

lender.name: Iftekhar
lender.loan_because: people who have the ideas and the drive should have the funds to sustain themselves.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.occupation: Executive Assistant to Vice President PRODUCTION
lender.loan_because: it makes my heart smile.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the largest newspaper company in the United States of America.

lender.name: Birgit
lender.loan_because: I really like this idea and want to support it

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I like to be able to make a difference even if it is only a small amount.

lender.name: ukachi
lender.occupation: Investor.We export and parts,cars from the U.S .

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I have had so much help, and I want to give back. I could not be where I am today if others did not help me in my time of need.

lender.name: Mette
lender.loan_because: It is the dignified way of helping.
lender.occupational_info: I work with making organisations work better and smarter through increasing the general work health balance.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: it can help someone make a positive difference in their lives. I choose to be part of a global community, and this is one more tiny part of my contribution to it.

lender.name: Avi Butbul
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: M & J
lender.loan_because: There is always someone less fortunate than yourself who could greatly benefit from a small part of what you can offer.

lender.name: Olga and Kris
lender.loan_because: We want to help hardworking people to make their lifes better. It is opportunity that matters.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: Zuerst kommt das Fressen, dann die Moral. (First comes eat, than the moral.) Bertold Brecht
lender.occupational_info: I work with children and youth. And I make bodywork (Feldenkrais) with everybody, who wants support.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is important to help people who are working hard and are trying to improve their lives.

lender.name: DavidandJohanna
lender.loan_because: We recently got married and asked for Kiva certificates as alternative gifts. We are really pleased to be able to make loans and become involved with Kiva entrepreneurs thanks to the generosity of our friends and family.

lender.name: Nihat
lender.loan_because: Since I live on credit, I'd like to extend the credit further.

lender.name: The Links San Diego, CA Chapter
Rolwin
lender.loan_because: I feel I am making a connection in another country

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: Kiva seems an excellent platform from which to learn more about how microfinance works
lender.occupational_info: I help people sort out their legal problems.

lender.name: Teri Lynn
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do! What a great feeling it will be to provide someone who struggles to make just enough for food. This comes from the heart!
lender.occupational_info: I sell cleaning products that are environmentally friendly. The company is called METHOD and we are blessed to have much success the last few years. They provide me with a nice income and life!

lender.name: Chuck & Peggy
lender.loan_because: Passing on God's love.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful thing to do...help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am an anesthesiologist who works to support his travel habits!

lender.name: Ketan
lender.loan_because: this is best way to encourage small businesses around the world and giving back to the community.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage large network of devices

lender.name: Friends of MTS Allstream
lender.loan_because: In 2008 MTS Allstream is celebrating its second century in business and as part of this celebration employees want to give back by encouraging entrepreneurial spirit around the world.
lender.occupational_info: MTS Allstream is currently the 3rd largest telecommunications company in Canada. This lending group is made up of Employees in the Consumer division in Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada.

lender.name: Monica et Matthieu
lender.loan_because: it's nice to see people with hope

lender.name: Mike and Jenn
lender.loan_because: it is a safer investment than our mortgage right now! oh, and it seems like a brilliant idea.
lender.occupational_info: i work at a university focusing on environmental issues, specifically restoring streams and rivers. My wife is in management but is working to become a social worker.

lender.name: Sarah & Ray
lender.loan_because: We can! We believe in helping others who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Ray: Marketing/Business Consulting Sarah: Microbiologist

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I know how helpful it can be when someone believes in you.
lender.occupational_info: I ran a hospitality business for fourteen years. We assisted clients with travel planning, personal services and lifestyle management.

lender.name: roger
lender.occupational_info: i'm an software engineer

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have many wonderful, hard-working friends in South China from my time working there at a printing factory.
lender.occupational_info: I spent 2 years at a printing factory in South China. I trained people on Macintosh computers and Pre-press equipment to make printing plates for the presses.

lender.name: mustapha
lender.loan_because: i want to buy supermarket
lender.occupational_info: im engineer but i woked from 7 years as markting excutive and i want to make my own business

lender.name: Beci
lender.loan_because: I believe that it will work.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office. I make sure that people claiming compensation for injuries are being treated fairly and that those who shouldn't be claiming don't.

lender.name: Alainna
lender.loan_because: Becuase one should. I want to help where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a doctor and plan on taking it abroad when I can.

lender.name: Jugal & Shelly
lender.loan_because: Kiva has enabled us to help
lender.occupational_info: lead an IT team for a financial corporation.

lender.name: Alessandro
lender.loan_because: It is my duty in this world as a human being to bring relief to those in need, and lending through Kiva does this in a scalable and repeatable way.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I love to help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an animal nurse.

lender.name: AKINTOLA
lender.loan_because: i want to help my mum to upgrade her small business.
lender.occupational_info: am a student,while she is a tailor tailor.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I have a great life and appreciate what I have. I am a new teacher wanting to make a difference in the lives of children.

lender.name: Kelley
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for the opportunities I've had in my life, but it didn't all come without a little hard work. These people aren't as fortunate as I, but they are willing to help themselves, and therefore, I'm willing to help them.
lender.occupational_info: I save lives - okay, not really. But I work at a hospital that does save lives, and I help manage the employee issues (human resources).

lender.name: QUYNH-ANH
lender.loan_because: somebody out there needs this money and could do so much more with it than I will ever be able to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an apprentice at a tattoo shop in the metro atlanta area.

lender.name: Rhea
lender.loan_because: Because it's a great way to help the others...

lender.name: Marcin
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Studying engineering and international relations

lender.name: Lydia
lender.loan_because: I want to impact the world around me and this is a unique and special way to actual be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage the technology that helps banks in the U.S. manage services for their customers.

lender.name: Joe & Jen
lender.loan_because: To make sparks

lender.name: Traci & Russell
lender.loan_because: we are so blessed and have so much to be thankful for, it is nice to help others.
lender.occupational_info: wife, mom, and part time hairdresser

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people grow!
lender.occupational_info: I have an office job in the United States military.

lender.name: Mikhail and Oksana
lender.loan_because: We are blessed with what we have and now it is time to help others.

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: Compared to the entrepreneurs, I have so much and they have so little of everything except courage

lender.name: Dd R
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Lana
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is giving back blessings that God has bestowed upon me and my family. I owe God everything, therefore I give something.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with legal issues and act as their assistant. Through the attorneys I work for we seek justice on their behalf. I also speak to women in jail and enourage them to follow God's plan for their life.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It is a way to give others the same opportunity that I have had.
lender.occupational_info: I make products that clean water.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe that we are all one and what we do for each other makes a difference for us all.
lender.occupational_info: I am a jewelry artist. I design, produce and sell my own work at shows around the Midwest of the United States.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I have been helped by others in the past when I needed it so it is my honor and obligation to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I empower people to become the best they can be.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I cried when I first heard about Kiva. I don't cry when I'm sad, I cry when things touch my soul.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find time for themselves in their busy lives.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and I believe in sharing your blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I generate & adjust the billing for a large utility company in the Midwest of North America.

lender.name: brett
lender.loan_because: In my travels to the third world I have met hundreds of motivated people that lack the funds to get started. This is an amazing concept that will empower the less fortunate not through a handout but by mutual respect.
lender.occupational_info: I create websites.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because:
I like supporting entrepreneurs, especially women entrepreneurs!
"If you've come to help me, you're wasting my time, but if you've come because your liberation is bound up with mine, lets work together." -Lilla Watson
lender.occupational_info: I work for STR Responsible Sourcing. We assist major US and European retailers ensure that the labor conditions of the factories they source from are adequate.

lender.name: Paulo
lender.loan_because: I wanna buy a instrument. It's make just in Ireland. It's tin whistle. I need $30 for buy this instrument.

lender.name: Tom & Linda
lender.loan_because: The whole world can benefit from one small gesture.

lender.name: Prashanth
lender.loan_because: To give a chance for someone to better their life.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.occupation: Work for a clothing store, Ross Stores
lender.loan_because: My 14 yr old grandson loaned first and taught us all how much we could help others and make a difference to this world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a big office with hundreds of others who support nearly 900 clothing stores across the US, called Ross Stores. My job is to manage a group of 50 employees who pay all of the bills associated with our stores, offices and warehouses.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur as well and like to help fellow entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Steve & Kami
lender.loan_because: God has given us so much, the least we could do is to help another. We still believe that each of us making small changes can add up to big change. We dream of a future where poverty and hunger are no more.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: God has done amazing things in my life, and I want others to feel His presence in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I want to glorify God in all that I do.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have what I need and want to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with so much - I want to show my appreciation by blessing others less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time mother and homemaker, and a member of the P.E.O. sisterhood

lender.name: Kenan
lender.loan_because: I believe it makes a difference.

lender.name: Jami
lender.loan_because: There are needs that I can help with.
lender.occupational_info: Love and teach children

lender.name: Hamid Schricker
lender.loan_because: giving other people a chance at a better life is the most important thing anyone can do.

lender.name: Reginald
lender.loan_because: this site is a great idea. Microcredit is the future.

lender.name: Symantec Aspire SW
lender.loan_because: As part of the Symantec Aspire mentor program, I believe giving and receiving is part of the process to enable growth
lender.occupational_info: We protect more people from more online threats than anyone in the world

lender.name: Nikitas
lender.loan_because: Resources have the most positive impact when they're in constant motion. By American standards, I'm far from wealthy; but I've been fortunate in my life, and if I could share but a small portion of that to make an impact in even just one other person's life -- then I've made a difference... in BOTH of our lives.

lender.name: Naninhos
lender.loan_because: We are from South America and we want to share with people in need.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: in a blink of an eye life can change for the better and if you can help somebody accomplish his/her goals all the better!
lender.occupational_info: Lots of paperwork.

lender.name: K&K
lender.loan_because: We have travelled throughout the world and feel it's now time to give something back and help others to help themselves, in a way which doesn't create or perpetuate dependence on others.

lender.name: jonathan
lender.loan_because: i want to give others an opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: i am a medical student and student of life.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate to be able to do what I love, and I think all people deserve the opportunity to pursue their own dreams.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.occupation: Communication Artist, Not For ProfitBusiness Owner

lender.name: Srikanth
lender.loan_because: I believe in Social Justice can be brought through compassionate capitalism.

lender.name: Shinae
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed. God has provided me with everything I need to become the person he intended. I now get to share in his delight as he works through me to do the same for others in need. "The people curse him who holds back grain (when the public needs it), but a blessing (from God and man) is upon the head of him who sells it. He who diligently seeks good seeks (God's) favor." Proverbs 11:26-27 I loan because the Father wants to provide for all his children, and he wants us to be able to share in his joy of doing so by letting us help! Sounds like a pretty good deal to me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business student studying Finance and Spanish.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference in somebody else life. and to show other people that I care
lender.occupational_info: I work with young boys that have been abused physically and mentally

lender.name: Jolene
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful opportunity to be able to give someone a helping hand that will enable them to build/expand their business and create a better future for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: We build custom homes.

lender.name: Tor Benestad
lender.loan_because: I believe small businesses are the backbone of every community.

lender.name: Mandava
lender.loan_because: I trade in hope.

lender.name: Williams Family
lender.loan_because:
âYou are the light of the world. A city on a hill cannot be hidden. Neither do people light a lamp and put it under a bowl. Instead they put it on its stand, and it gives light to everyone in the house. In the same way, let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.
-- Matthew 5:14 - 16
